name: Tony Aprile
description: I have a large heart, compassionate soul, lovely sense of humor, am also emotionally stable and balance. I am outgoing, funny, intelligent, confident, easygoing, honest, charming, generous, kind and lovely in all sides. I enjoy laughing a lot cause that is the way i keep myself younger in my look and also young in the heart, i enjoy having daily exercise to keep strong, fit and physical attractive. I love pets so much, i have a lovely Dog who is my friend. Am a God fairy Christian, i believe so much in the heavily Father who is the Almighty God. I’m a lovely father, i have a lovely child who makes my world fill with blessing, my child had been in my custody ever since i got divorced. Am a building contractor, am self employed and i love my Job so much cause it helps have a good living, i am not the best in my field but am extremely thankful cause am successful that is why am a real gem among my peers.
